channel.title: Support Ukraine on 🌻💙💛 Support Ukraine
channel.description: Recent content in Support Ukraine on 🌻💙💛 Support Ukraine

item.title: Charities
item.description: Humanitarian Aid Nova Ukraine A non-profit organization dedicated to raising awareness about Ukraine in the US and throughout the world and providing humanitarian aid to Ukraine. Razom Ukraine Razom, which means “together” in Ukrainian, believes deeply in the enormous potential of dedicated volunteers around the world united by a single goal: to unlock the potential of Ukraine. Other Forms of Aid and Resourcesh Help Ukraine Win Site that aggregates charities and other information to help Ukraine.

item.title: Information & Disinformation
item.description: Purpose To make and maintain the two known lists of infomration: trusted and untrusted. There is a lot of grey area in the middle that is not going to be covered by these source lists. ✅ Trusted Sources ✅ The following are trusted sources of information. Video 🎥 e.g. YouTube, Twitch, Television Text 📝 e.g. Digital newspapers, Twitter and Other Social Media ⛔️ Distrusted Sources ⛔️ The following are distrusted sources of information, including sources of direct propogata and intentional misinformation.

item.title: What and Who
item.description: These pages cover who to know, what agencies, and how they interrelate. Who’s Who Immigration Reponse Some governments have given special visa and/or immigration status to Ukranian refugees. 🇨🇦 Canada

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: This site is hosted on Github and updates to the site directly are made via pull request and tickets are managed via a Github repo.

item.title: United States
item.description: United States Template Letter Purpose If you are a citizen of the United States and want to reach out to your elected officials, here is a template for what you can discuss / say. Find Your Representatives If you’re not sure who your representatives are, or what their contact information is, you can use the following site to get their full contact information including phone and email: https://www.congress.gov/members/find-your-member Phone / Voice Template Hi <representative> - my name is <name> and I am a voter in <state / district>.
